articles.description: After being burned by crude’s slump in the first half of 2023, hedge funds are rushing back into the oil market with their most bullish wagers in more than a year.

articles.title: Extreme heat drives farmers to go nocturnal - The Washington Post - The Washington Post
articles.description: Rising temperatures have led more farmers to harvest crops in the middle of the night to protect their workforce and the quality of their produce from extreme heat.
articles.content:
